data.title: Midland, TX - Official Website
data.text:
To learn more about the upcoming November 2024 election, Click Here.

Notice of Deadline for Filing an Application to be Placed on the Ballot: Click Here

Candidate Applicants: Robin Poole Brian Stubbs Heather Bredimus Eric Davidson John Bulkholder Rance C. Norton

This year's tax levy to fund maintenance and operations expenditures exceeds last year's maintenance and operations tax levy. Also, this year's M&O is higher than the effective maintenance and operations tax rate. The following statements must be included on the homepage of any internet website operated by the City of Midland: City of Midland ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE. THE TAX RATE WILL EFFECTIVELY BE RAISED BY 2.54 PERCENT AND WILL RAISE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS ON A $100,000 HOME BY APPROXIMATELY $-15.03.

ðŸ”— 2024 Fiscal Year Budget
